description:
Pa tells Ashibe the truth about coming to Hokkaido, and Ashibe is so upset, he runs off with Goma-chan.
While searching for Ashibe, Pa and Ma run into Grandpa, Sugao-kun and his family.
They explain what happened and Suago-kun quickly goes looking for Ashibe...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよならなんて言わないよ!
